name: Hasteus
description:
How to Play:

You're the green slime, and your goal is to defeat all enemies and get the highest score possible.

Clickable objects will appear all around the screen - click them to hurt the enemy and get points. Objects that are more red give far more points, so try focus on those. These will do a lot more damage too, making you complete the game quicker which results a large score bonus (quicker win = higher score bonus).

You can drag the mouse around to grab these objects easier. (Of course, be sure to focus on the brighter red ones)

Clickable object:

More valuable object (example):

Additional Information

Language: Written in Java with the LibGDX framework

Music & Sfx: Made in LMMS

Programmer art: Made in gimp
